site.title: Your Vision, Our Platform â€“ WoW-CMS
site.description: Unlock the potential of your ideas with WoW-CMS, where your vision becomes reality. Explore our versatile content management platform today.

hero.subtitle: Join our tight-knit community, where we specialize in creating CMS projects tailored for gaming enthusiasts.

community.menu-1-desc: In our discord you can find the latest information about our products, as well as support and a community willing to help you.
community.menu-2-desc: Our projects follow the Open-Source philosophy, all of these can be found on our Github.
community.menu-3-desc: A CMS focused on offering services for World of Warcraft servers. With more than 5 years of development.

feature.title: Our Mission: Transforming Gaming Community Interaction
feature.subtitle: We build a centralized CMS for gamers to connect, collaborate, and share experiences.

cards.card-1-desc: We embrace the open-source philosophy. Our CMS is built on the power of the community and transparency. We collaborate to make our code accessible to all, allowing for complete customization.
cards.card-2-desc: We've made our CMS truly global. With multilingual support, you can now experience our platform in your preferred language. The diversity of languages reflects our dedication to an inclusive community.
cards.card-3-desc: Our community is the heart of everything we do. Here, gamers and enthusiasts come together, share ideas, and create together. Join a passionate network of people who share your love for gaming and content creation.
